Up to version 1.4.3, the coefficients used in the polynomial were too "small"
to "cover" the entire secret in most cases.

Below, a 17-byte secret split into shares.
For 1.4.3, note that each share begins with "347233520387150396565522..."
For 1.4.4, note that each share differs on all characters.


Converting the 1.4.3 x:1 share to a string  -
  this shows the leaked portion of the secret:
$ java -jar secretshare.jar  bigintcs -mode bi2s \
    34723352038715039656552253261137708306441398353306407835371408807
The Cat In �)P��?(��Y��





#
#   1.4.3
#

$ java -jar secretshare.jar split -k 3 -n 6 -prime4096 \
>     -sS "The Cat In The Hat 4096bits"
Secret Share version 1.4.3
Date                          : 2018-04-20 21:26:43
UUID                          : cceed915-01bf-4167-bbb0-73160843c2d3
n = 6
k = 3

Share (x:1) = 34723352038715039656552253261137708306441398353306407835371408807
Share (x:2) = 34723352038715039656552253482366900707714452820563807669616744403
Share (x:3) = 34723352038715039656552253828120801262030910130340821206841529079
Share (x:4) = 34723352038715039656552254298399409969390770282637448447045762835
Share (x:5) = 34723352038715039656552254893202726829794033277453689390229445671
Share (x:6) = 34723352038715039656552255612530751843240699114789544036392577587
Share (x:1) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e209d-290050-02b4ac-3f1128-f5d21e-598da7-9A3337
Share (x:2) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e2143-98319f-ac9d55-602045-f8549d-f597d3-0520B6
Share (x:3) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e2247-b5f90f-461b6f-836187-40bde1-3d92f7-324A96
Share (x:4) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e23a9-82569e-cf2efa-a8d4ec-cf0de8-317f13-B4B6E5
Share (x:5) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e2568-fd4a4e-47d7f6-d07a76-a344b2-d15c27-F8616F
Share (x:6) = bigintcs:546865-204361-742049-6e2786-26d41d-b01663-fa5224-bd6241-1d2a33-F8D044



#
# 1.4.4
#

$ java -jar secretshare.jar split -k 3 -n 6 -prime4096 \
>     -sS "The Cat In The Hat 4096bits"
Secret Share version 1.4.4
Date                          : 2018-04-20 21:25:47
UUID                          : 98be5860-5bfc-468a-8de7-b9643d2a0f41
n = 6
k = 3

Share (x:1) = 56982165220952476179873508845079699143821937971556853763125608529
Share (x:2) = 90270079172642355242561521564160352324120923078919986476063102599
Share (x:3) = 134587093893784676844616291321675183599108702050658019842918004501
Share (x:4) = 189933209384379440986037818117624192968785274886770953863690314235
Share (x:5) = 256308425644426647666826101952007380433150641587258788538380031801
Share (x:6) = 333712742673926296886981142824824745992204802152121523866987157199
Share (x:1) = bigintcs:8a8416-a63404-a3723a-159276-70aabb-cc907f-f9606b-fcd183-dd0051-06D4D3
Share (x:2) = bigintcs:db6f35-4b72ea-fe2974-f30255-7c5955-3e6c21-42fad6-688b23-3f9687-E3A080
Share (x:3) = bigintcs:000001-4729c1-100014-8445fa-066ff1-8b70ec-9df457-fd036f-7c6340-913715-3FBC05
Share (x:4) = bigintcs:000001-cdb3b9-f3db81-35c7c9-4fdb4a-9df181-eb2924-277a37-3859db-d1e1fb-4143C6
Share (x:5) = bigintcs:000002-6f0d1f-f70531-12aee2-cf4460-b3db15-260a85-c25f2d-9c6ef5-019739-9B44B4
Share (x:6) = bigintcs:000003-2b35f3-197d24-1afb46-84ab33-cd2da6-4e987c-cdb252-a8a28c-2056cf-75DE36
